DiSTATIS Plot of Posterior or Bootstrap Samples

Source: R/plot_distatis.R
plot_distatis.Rd

DiSTATIS Plot of Posterior or Bootstrap Samples

plot_distatis(
  obj,
  ncores = 1,
  show_donors = TRUE,
  show_markers = TRUE,
  repel = TRUE
)

Arguments

obj

Object of class cytoeffect_poisson or cytoeffect_poisson_mcle computed by poisson_lognormal or poisson_lognormal_mcle
ncores

Number of cores
show_donors

Include donor random effect
show_markers

Include markers
repel

Repel marker names

Value

ggplot2 object

Examples

df = simulate_data()
str(df)
#> Classes ‘tbl_df’, ‘tbl’ and 'data.frame':	800 obs. of  7 variables:
#>  $ donor    : chr  "pid01" "pid01" "pid01" "pid01" ...
#>  $ condition: Factor w/ 2 levels "control","treatment": 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 ...
#>  $ m01      : num  31 11 16 18 21 79 186 18 10 9 ...
#>  $ m02      : num  3 1 0 2 3 0 12 0 5 2 ...
#>  $ m03      : num  5 0 20 5 18 2 15 8 4 2 ...
#>  $ m04      : num  3 7 4 4 2 7 2 1 9 1 ...
#>  $ m05      : num  0 32 29 20 33 17 95 62 11 5 ...
